name: Modern Shogi
description:
Shogi is an ancient Japanese game: Simular to western chess, but powered with piece drop feature. Modern Shogi is 3D client app with a large amount of room for improvement.

Features

  • Auto-show all possible moves when you hover your mouse cursor over piece
  • Modern multiplayer experience through master server
  • Tracking threats and protections on tiles
  • Auto-move in one-click if piece has only one move
  • Auto-promotion for some pieces
  • Checks announcing
  • Restricted invalid moves(cannot be disabled)
  • Try-rule and 28-piece rule for impasse
  • Various handicaps and timer options
  • Lots of piece, UI and board themes
  • 6 customizable UI themes inspired by buddhism religion
  • Replay recorded games

Creator note : Not all functions are available yet. Now it is under active development. I will try to improve it, because I like Shogi very much.

The game first tested for two native resolutions (Default screen resolution) - 1920x1080 and 2560x1080. Other resolutions has not been tested yet.

If you want to see a replay(currently only KIF format/81dojo is supported) - put it to Library folder - C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\ModernShogi\Library\Replays\KIF

Songs - you can put your music(in OGG format) to play in game. Push it to C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\ModernShogi\Library\Songs
